game - package game
 
Game - Class in game
The Game Class is the controlling class for the ShippingGame Project.
Game(String) - Constructor for class game.Game
Creates a default (test) game instance.
Game(String, File) - Constructor for class game.Game
Creates a game instance with a set Map, read from File f.
gameFile(String) - Static method in class game.Game
Returns a file for the string map filename.
getAIntersection() - Method in class game.Map
Returns a 2x1 array of edges that have lines that intersect If no two edges intersect, returns null.
getC1() - Method in class gui.Line
Returns the circle that is first end of this line
getC2() - Method in class gui.Line
Returns the circle that is the second end of this line
getCircle() - Method in class game.Node
Returns the Circle that represents this node graphically
getCircle() - Method in class game.Parcel
Gets the circle that represents this Parcel on the GUI
getCircle() - Method in class game.Truck
Returns the circle that represents this truck when it is drawn

Returns the color of this object.

Returns the Color of this MapElement

Returns the color of this Parcel

Returns the Color of this Truck

Returns the color of this circle

Returns the color policy for painting roads.
getComingFrom() - Method in class game.Truck
Returns the node this truck is coming from, the rear exit of the edge it is currently on.
getConnect(Node) - Method in class game.Node
Returns the road that this node shares with node other, or null if not connected

getEdges() - Method in class game.Map
Returns a HashSet containing all the Edges in this map.
getEdgesSize() - Method in class game.Map
Returns the number of Edges in this map
getExits() - Method in class game.Edge
Returns the exits of this line, a length 2 array of Nodes.
getExits() - Method in class game.Node
Returns a HashSet that contains the same edges as this Node This is to prevent the addition of edges to exits without proper clearance.
getExitsSize() - Method in class game.Node
Returns the number of exits from this node
getFile() - Method in class game.Game
Returns the file this game was created from.
getFirstExit() - Method in class game.Edge
Returns the first exit of this Edge

Returns the speed of the game
getGoingTo() - Method in class game.Truck
Returns the Truck's eventual destination; the Node this Truck will be at when the current travel queue is empty.
